3 #define BLOB_MAX_PX 4000

26 int CheckPerceptionPipelineWithRealFootage(std::string filepath)
27 {
28  cv::SimpleBlobDetector::Params params;
29  params.minArea = BLOB_MIN_PX;
30  params.maxArea = BLOB_MAX_PX;
31  params.filterByArea = true;
32  params.filterByColor = false;
33  params.filterByInertia = false;
34  params.filterByConvexity = false;
35  params.thresholdStep = 50;
36  cv::Mat img = cv::imread(img_path+filepath, cv::IMREAD_COLOR);
37  cv::Mat img_hsv, img_threshold, img_keypoints;
38  cv::cvtColor(img, img_hsv, cv::COLOR_BGR2HSV);
39  image_processing::PerceptFilterThreshold("red", img_hsv, img_threshold);
40  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints = image_processing::PerceptBlobDetection(img, img_threshold, img_keypoints, params);
41  cv::namedWindow("Image");
42  cv::imshow("Image", img_keypoints);
43  cv::waitKey(3000);
44  cv::namedWindow("thresh");
45  cv::imshow("thresh", img_threshold);
46  cv::waitKey(3000);
47  cv::destroyAllWindows();
48  cv::imwrite(img_path+"/testresult"+filepath,img_keypoints);
49  return keypoints.size();
50 }
51 
52 void CheckImages(void){
53  char filename[100];
54  ROS_INFO("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~");
55  ROS_INFO("Testing perception with real footage");
56  ROS_INFO("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~");
57  for(int i = 1; i <=6; i++){
58  sprintf(filename, "summit_xl_%d.png", i);
59  int keypoints_found = CheckPerceptionPipelineWithRealFootage(std::string(filename));
60  ROS_INFO_COND(keypoints_found==2, "All 'tomatos' found in %s", filename);
61  ROS_ERROR_COND(keypoints_found!=2, "Found %d tomatoes instead of 2 in image %s", keypoints_found, filename);
62  }
63  ROS_INFO("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~");
64 }
65 
66 void TestTomatoQueue(void){
67  ROS_INFO("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~");
68  ROS_INFO("Testing tomato queue");
69  ROS_INFO("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~");
70  TomatoQueue tq;
71  ROS_INFO("Should add tomato @ 0 0 0 with r=4cm");
72  tq.AddTomato({0,0,0,0.04}); // shoud add
73  ROS_INFO("Should fail to add tomato @ 0 0 0 with r=4cm");
74  tq.AddTomato({0,0,0,0.04}); // shoud NOT add since alread exists
75  ROS_INFO("Should fail to add tomato @ 0 0 0.02 with r=4cm");
76  tq.AddTomato({0,0,0.02,0.04}); // shoud NOT add since (similar) alread exists
77  ROS_INFO("Should add tomato @ 1 0 0 with r=4cm");
78  tq.AddTomato({1,0,0,0.04}); // shoud add
79  ROS_INFO("Should add tomato -1 0 0 0 with r=4cm");
80  tq.AddTomato({-1,0,0,0.04}); // shoud add
81  ROS_INFO_COND(tq.GetReachableTomatoCount(0,0,0,100.0)==3, "Queue successfully filled");
82  ROS_ERROR_COND(tq.GetReachableTomatoCount(0,0,0,100.0)!=3, "Something went wrong while filling queue --> overlapping tomatoes added!");
83  ROS_INFO_COND(tq.GetReachableTomatoCount(1,0,0,1.1)==2, "Queue successfully filtered for reachable tomatoes");
84  ROS_ERROR_COND(tq.GetReachableTomatoCount(1,0,0,1.1)!=2, "Something went wrong while filtering the queue for reacheable tomatoes!");
85  ROS_INFO("FINAL QUEUE:");
86  tq.PrintQueue();
87  ROS_INFO("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~");
88 }
